text: Andrzej Wojciech Suski (born 24 December 1941) is a retired Polish Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1965. He served as Auxiliary Bishop of Płock from 1986 to 1992. After this, he became the Bishop of Toruń. He retired in November 2017. He was born in Płock. ==References== ==Other websites== * Andrzej Suski at Catholic-Hierarchy.org Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Polish Roman Catholic bishops
title: Andrzej Suski
